text: Yappity-yap~ It's Francis!
I suppose everyone knows about Japanese soul foods: takoyaki or okonomiyaki.
However, you shouldn't forget monjayaki that is famous from Tsukishima.
In order to complete the "yaki" series, I am already on my way!
Here is the first tip on monjayaki!
Let us learn about monjayaki at Tsukishima Monjya Promotion Society Cooperative Association!
It is right by Tsukishima Station on Yurakucho Line of Tokyo Metro!
It accepts reservations for those on group tours and supports individuals with selecting restaurants!
Monjayaki has become a popular soul food!
One reason it is so popular is because of variety of tastes!
Can we ask the staff to help if we are not sure how to make them?
There are lots of souvenirs, as well!
Cute T-shirts!
Great!  You can make monjayaki at home!
I have to make monjayaki on my own!
I am at a monjayaki joint named Mugi.
The lantern is the landmark.
I will have the beautiful Ms. Nobuchi teach me how to make monjayaki!
I put on a Tsukishima monjya T-shirt, and I'm all ready!
Let's do this!
